About.Hours & facilities: Open Mon-Fri 9am-3pm in school terms; closed school holidays. General reference assistance available. Copying services available for books, journals, original records to A3, newspapers, maps and plans.

About.Access: Minimum age of reader is post secondary school.

About.Acquisition focus: Maintenance of records of the school, information on the locality and of past students. Some reference material on Queensland education is also collected.

About.Major holdings: Kedron State High School: School registers 1956- (2m); School photos 1956 (2m); Sporting Trophies 1956-(3m). Magazine Committee: Nordek 1956- (1m).

About.References: Stoodley, A (ed) The History of Kedron State High School, 1956-1988
